overview:
Tom is responsible for developing the world class ad decisioning and optimal allocation technology that powers Videology.

Tom has more than 25 years of experience in the information technology industry in key technical and executive positions. Prior to joining Videology, Tom founded the Baltimore-based information technology services company, LCG Technologies Corporation, served as CTO with Advertising.com, and assumed numerous technical and management positions for Procter & Gamble within the information technology division.

Tom graduated from Cornell University with a B.S. in Electrical Engineering and a minor in Computer Engineering.
